test abbr+replace+include+rawhtml+link: replace_abbr_include_rawhtml_link

test abbr+replace+include: replace_abbr_include_text

Test hoverxref+include: text_hoverxref

Test hoverxref+include+replace: test hoverxref: replace_hoverxref

These new roles are alias of the ref role and works in the same. See gltest_glossary:replace_hoverxref for more detailed information about this and other examples.
